Yes, I have two TXT records:
list of IP addresses and ports of other peers
token=BuJI4j/UhXqqGO018nfnaJGJc26d03eLOxWbCcF+QRk=
IP spoofing protection; send this back in following requests
server repeats itself (or responds with a different set of peers)
but also stores the new peer into the its for this Dat
Time passes, the discovery server learns of a new peer
Time passes, peer leaves the swarm and no longer wants new peers
server repeats itself again and
removes this peer from its list
